price: লাইলাতুল ক্বদৰ হৈছে এহেজাৰ মাহতকৈও শ্ৰেষ্ঠ।
arabic: لَيۡلَةُ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡ أَلۡفِ شَهۡرٖ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: laylatu al-qadri khayrun min alfi shahrin
